scripts.start: watchexec --restart --watch Sources --exts swift --signal SIGINT swift run
scripts.migrate:reset: npm run migrate:down && npm run migrate:up
scripts.migrate:nuke: killall Postico; dropdb flp_dev && createdb flp_dev && npm run migrate:up
scripts.nuke: npm run migrate:nuke; npm run test:db:nuke
scripts.test:db:nuke: killall Postico; dropdb flp_test && createdb flp_test
scripts.test:clear: clear && printf '\e[3J' && npm run test; echo
scripts.test:clear:isolate: clear && printf '\e[3J' && npm run test:isolate; echo
scripts.test:watch: watchexec --restart --watch Sources --watch Tests --exts swift npm run test:clear
scripts.test:watch:isolate: watchexec --restart --watch Sources --watch Tests --exts swift npm run test:clear:isolate
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run test
